thread.title: Newcrest sells balance stake in Evolution
thread.title_full: Newcrest sells balance stake in Evolution

title: Newcrest sells balance stake in Evolution
text:
Thu, Oct 1, 2015, 10:09 AM AEST - Australia Markets close in 5 hrs 51 mins Newcrest sells balance stake in Evolution AAP – 26 minutes ago Print 
Australia's largest gold miner Newcrest Mining has sold off its remaining stake in rival gold producer Evolution. 
Newcrest said it has netted $125 million from the sale since June 30, and has used the proceeds to pay down debt. 
The miner had previously sold down more than half of its 32 per cent stake in Evolution, in February for $106 million. @y7finance on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook ANZ confirm CEO's departure, CFO promotion AAP 
ANZ chief executive Mike Smith is stepping down after eight years at the top of Australia's third biggest bank … Terms
